summary: A gold recolor of Clavicus\' mask.
descriptionHtml:
A gold recolor of Clavicus\' mask, requested by salmon1990.

Screenshots have not been altered, but use an ENB mod (Ideal ENB found here, http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6403).

I haven\'t tested this on any system or game other than my own. Fixes and variations to it may be uploaded later.

To install: move or merge the textures folder to your skyrim/data folder.
To remove: delete the .dds file in the subfolder \'clavicusvilemask\' (skyrim/data/textures/clothes/clavicusvilemask)

I will also take requests for different color and design versions of this mask at this time. I will not guarantee that I will fulfill these requests but if you leave a comment I will consider making more alternative versions if  and when I have the time.
author: xleileix
